text: Va [Ej pajomʙar, jod kun az] hangome ki Iʙrohim guft: "Parvardigoro, ʙa man nişon ʙideh, ci guna murdagonro zinda mekunī"? [Alloh taolo] Farmud: "Magar imon najovardaī"? Guft: "Bale, vale [mexoham] qalʙam orom ʙigirad". Farmud: "Pas, cahor parranda ʙigir [va ʙikuş] va pora – pora kun [va dar ham ʙijomez], sipas ʙar har kūhe porae az onhoro ʙigzor, [va] ongoh onhoro [ʙa sūji xud] faro xon; [xohī did, ki zinda meşavand va] şitoʙon ʙa sūji tu meojand; va [ej Iʙrohim], ʙidon, ki Alloh taolo şikastnopaziru hakim ast
